summary: A cute aesthetic notes and to-do list website with pastel colors and friendly UI elements for writing, organizing notes, and managing tasks with checkboxes
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Cute kawaii cloud illustration with a smiling face in soft pastel colors (cloud-icon.dim_128x128.png)
- Adorable star icon with sparkles in pastel yellow and pink (star-icon.dim_96x96.png)
- Playful checkmark icon in cute style with rounded edges (check-icon.dim_64x64.png)

existing_features.title: Create a notes management system that allows users to create, read, update, and delete notes with title and content fields
Create a to-do list system that allows users to add tasks with checkboxes to mark completion status
Design and implement a cute aesthetic theme with pastel colors, rounded corners, soft shadows, playful typography, and adorable UI elements throughout the entire application
Render generated decorative images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated for the cute aesthetic theme

new_feature_requests.summary: To-do list with checkboxes for task management
Cute aesthetic theme with pastel colors and friendly UI
